title: Gazebo and Caffe2 Protocol Buffers incompatible

content.raw:
Hi,

I try to write a plugin for gazebo that uses the Caffe2.  I am on Ubuntu 16.04 and the error occurs for all versions of gazebo. Caffe2 was built from source and gazebo via apt-get.

Now when compiling the plugin, the error "Incompatible with your Protocol Buffer headers" occurs. This is because Caffe2 installs libprotoc 3.5.0. But how can one fix the problem?

Thank you in advance

Martin
content.html:
Hi,

I try to write a plugin for gazebo that uses the Caffe2. I am on Ubuntu 16.04 and the error occurs for all versions of gazebo. Caffe2 was built from source and gazebo via apt-get.

Now when compiling the plugin, the error "Incompatible with your Protocol Buffer headers" occurs. This is because Caffe2 installs libprotoc 3.5.0. But how can one fix the problem?

Thank you in advance
